department.dept_long_name: Standing Committee on Global Health and Health Policy

course.title: The Quality of Health Care in America
course.meeting_text: M., W., 4:30-6 and a weekly section to be arranged.
course.faculty_text: Ashish Kumar Jha (Medical School) and Anupam Bapu Jena (Medical School)
course.description: Offers information and experiences regarding most important issues and challenges in health care quality. Overview of the dimensions of quality of care, including outcomes, overuse, underuse, variation in practice patterns, errors and threats to patient safety, service flaws, and forms of waste. Each session focuses on one specific issue, exploring patterns of performance, data sources, costs, causes, and remedies. Explores desirable properties of health care systems that perform at high levels in many dimensions of quality.
